skill.name: atxp
skill.description: Access ATXP paid API tools for web search, AI image generation, music creation, video generation, and X/Twitter search. Use when users need real-time web search, AI-generated media (images, music, video), or X/Twitter search. Requires authentication via `npx atxp login`.
skill.summary: Access ATXP's paid API services for AI-generated media and real-time search
skill.author: atxp-dev

security_audit.summary: All 36 static analysis findings have been evaluated and dismissed as false positives. The detected 'external_commands' are documentation examples (shell commands in backticks), not actual code execution. Network URLs point to legitimate ATXP API endpoints. Filesystem and environment access patterns are for standard configuration management. This skill provides documentation for accessing a legitimate paid API service.

content.user_title: Access ATXP AI Tools for Search and Media Generation
content.value_statement: Get real-time web search results and generate AI images, music, and videos through ATXP's paid API services. This skill helps Claude Code users leverage powerful external AI tools without leaving their development environment.
actual_capabilities: Execute real-time web searches using ATXP search API
Generate AI images from text prompts using ATXP image service
Create AI-generated music tracks from descriptions
Produce AI videos from text prompts
Search X/Twitter for real-time social media content
Authenticate and manage ATXP API connections
limitations: Requires ATXP account and authentication via `npx atxp login`
API usage may incur charges based on ATXP pricing
Dependent on ATXP service availability and rate limits
Cannot modify or delete content created through ATXP services

use_cases.title: Research and Content Creation
use_cases.description: Content creators and researchers can perform real-time web searches and generate AI images, music, or videos to enhance their projects without switching between multiple tools.

use_cases.title: Social Media Monitoring
use_cases.description: Developers and analysts can search X/Twitter for brand mentions, trending topics, or competitor activity to inform product decisions and marketing strategies.

use_cases.title: Rapid Prototyping with AI Assets
use_cases.description: Developers can quickly generate placeholder images, audio, or video content for prototypes and demos without needing design skills or external software.

prompt_templates.title: Search the Web
prompt_templates.prompt: Search for information about [topic]. Use ATXP search to find the latest results.

prompt_templates.title: Generate an AI Image
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an AI image with the prompt: [detailed description of image]. Use ATXP image generation.

prompt_templates.title: Multi-Tool Research Workflow
prompt_templates.prompt: Search for [topic] using ATXP web search, then generate an image that represents the key findings. Summarize the search results and create a visual.
prompt_templates.scenario: Intermediate - Combined search and image generation

prompt_templates.title: Social Media Content Pipeline
prompt_templates.prompt: Search X for trending posts about [topic/industry] in the last 24 hours. Analyze the sentiment and themes, then generate an AI music track that captures the mood of the conversation.
prompt_templates.scenario: Advanced - X search with creative generation

output_examples.input: Search for 'latest TypeScript features 2025' using ATXP
output_examples.output:
I'll search for the latest TypeScript features using ATXP.

```bash
npx atxp search 'latest TypeScript features 2025'
```

Results:
1. TypeScript 5.4 introduces improved type inference...
2. New decorator metadata API now available...
3. Performance improvements in compiler check times...

output_examples.input: Generate an image of a futuristic coding workspace
output_examples.output:
I'll create an AI-generated image of a futuristic coding workspace using ATXP.

```bash
npx atxp image 'A futuristic coding workspace with holographic displays, floating code windows, neon lighting, sleek minimalist desk setup, cyberpunk aesthetic'
```

Your image has been generated and is available at: [image URL]

output_examples.input: Search X for mentions of Claude Code
output_examples.output:
I'll search X for recent mentions of Claude Code.

```bash
npx atxp x 'Claude Code'
```

Recent posts:
- @developer1: Just tried Claude Code for the first time...
- @techblogger: Claude Code is changing how I write...
- @engineer2: The new features in Claude Code are...

best_practices: Always verify that ATXP_CONNECTION is set before running commands to avoid authentication errors
Use descriptive, detailed prompts for image/music/video generation to get higher quality results
Cache search results when appropriate to minimize API usage and reduce costs
anti_patterns: Do not share ATXP credentials or connection strings in public repositories or chat logs
Avoid running expensive generation commands (video, high-res images) without confirming user intent first
Do not rely solely on ATXP search results for critical security or medical decisions

faq.question: Do I need an ATXP account to use this skill?
faq.answer: Yes, you need an ATXP account and must authenticate using `npx atxp login` before using the API tools. The skill will check for the ATXP_CONNECTION environment variable.

faq.question: Is there a cost to use ATXP services?
faq.answer: Yes, ATXP is a paid API service. Usage charges depend on which tools you use (search, image generation, music, video) and your volume of requests. Check ATXP pricing for details.

faq.question: What AI models power the image and video generation?
faq.answer: ATXP uses various AI models for generation. The specific models are managed by ATXP and may change as they update their services. The skill simply interfaces with their API.

faq.question: Can I use this skill with Codex or only Claude Code?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code as indicated in the supported tools. The commands are executed through the CLI interface.

faq.question: What should I do if I get an authentication error?
faq.answer: Run `npx atxp login` to authenticate, then source the configuration file with `source ~/.atxp/config` to set the ATXP_CONNECTION environment variable.

faq.question: Are there rate limits for ATXP API calls?
faq.answer: Yes, ATXP enforces rate limits based on your account tier. If you encounter rate limit errors, you may need to wait before making additional requests or upgrade your ATXP plan.
